decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be commenced not later than the expiration of one year from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The premises shall be used for a restaurant and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class A3 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (amended 2005), or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted shall not be carried on outside the following times 11:00  to 23:30 Monday to Saturday and 12:00 to 23:30 Sundays and Public Holidays.
Condition : 4 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 5 - The use shall not commence until a scheme for control of fumes and odours including details of sound attenuation for any necessary plant has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing.

Condition : 6 - The use shall not commence until a scheme for the ventilation of the premises of an appropriate outlet level, including details of sound attenuation for any necessary plant and the standard or dilution expected has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 7 - The use hereby permitted shall be confined to sales to customers attending the premises, and shall not extend to the delivery of food or drink to customers by vehicle.

Condition : 8 - The use hereby permitted shall not be begun until details of the arrangements for storing of waste and recycled materials have been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.  The arrangements for storing waste and recycled materials shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with any approval given and shall be completed before any part of the accommodation hereby permitted is occupied.

Condition : 9 - Before the development is commenced a scheme for protecting the existing residential accommodation from excessive noise shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority and any works which form part of such a scheme shall be completed before any part of the development is first occupied or used.
description: Change of use from A1 (retail) to A3 (restaurant) incorporating the erection of a single-storey rear extension and installation of flue on rear elevation.
